messages.subject: Now that I think of it......
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/23/03 1:01:27 AM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/23/03 1:01:27 AM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< But there are things that I DO have to teach,
in some form. >>
No you don't.
You've let some school scare you into doing what they think is best.
If unschooling is the goal, then just DO it. Forget about the school, they
have NO power over you.
Find other unschoolers in your area to find out how to deal with officials.
You have convinced yourself you have to answer to the school and I highly
doubt that is the case at all.

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
